glide_time.description: Glide/portamento duration in ms (0–10000, pad 5): 0 = none/instant, 10000 = maximum allowed glide time. Zero-padded.

glide_shape.description: Glide curve/shape: L = linear, E = exponential, S = stepwise (chromatic slur). Single uppercase letter, order L, E, S.

pitch_span.description: Pitch span in cents (0–2400, pad 4): 0 = none, 2400 = two octaves. Zero-padded.

slur_intensity.description: Slur intensity (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = sharp, discrete steps; 1000 = maximally blended/legato. Zero-padded.

description: GLI (prefix), glide_time (5 digits), glide_shape (1 letter), pitch_span (4 digits), slur_intensity (4 digits); all zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: GLI00500E12000980 = 00500 ms glide, E (exponential), 1200 cents span, 0980 intensity.
